item.title: Tools of The Trade :: Git
item.description: Introduction This is the first in a series of posts about tools and processes which make my life as a engineer better. In this first post we’ll take a look at Git. Git is a wonderful tool. For teams working together (and individuals!) on source code, git is the go to for distributed version control software. It’s assumed here that the reader already has a working knowledge of Git. This post focuses on tooling to be used on top of Git
